channel.title: Definitions on The GUTS+ System
channel.description: Recent content in Definitions on The GUTS+ System

item.title: Definition of Game Master
item.description: The Game Master (GM for short) is the narrator and controller of the game world.

item.title: Definition of In-Character
item.description: Actions taken by a character rather than the player.

item.title: Definition of Non-Playable Character
item.description: A character played and controlled by the Game Master instead of by the players.

item.title: Definition of Out-of-Character
item.description: Actions and dialog taken by the player but not the character.

item.title: Definition of nDs
item.description: The formula representing how many of what type of die to roll (n dice with s sides). For example, 2D6 means a roll of 2 six-sided dice.
